name: Samosa
description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and green chilies, deep-fried to perfection.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: A flavorful vegetable curry served with buttered pav (bread rolls) and garnished with chopped onions and coriander.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpea curry (chole) served with deep-fried bread (bhature), topped with pickled carrots and green chilies.

name: Aloo Tikki
description: Crispy potato patties seasoned with spices, served with tamarind chutney and yogurt.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Marinated paneer cubes skewered with vegetables and grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney.

name: Vada Pav
description: Spicy potato fritter (vada) sandwiched in a pav (bread roll), served with green chutney.

name: Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with spices and layered with marinated meat (chicken or mutton) or vegetables, served with raita.

name: Dosa
description: Thin and crispy crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

name: Idli Sambar
description: Soft and fluffy steamed rice cakes served with flavorful lentil soup (sambar) and coconut chutney.

name: Chaat
description: A delightful mix of crispy fried dough (papdi), boiled potatoes, chickpeas, and tangy tamarind chutney, garnished with sev (crispy chickpea noodles) and fresh coriander.

name: Pani Puri
description: Hollow crispy balls filled with spicy tamarind water, potato, chickpeas, and garnished with sev.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Margherita pizza featuring creamy mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and fragrant basil leaves atop a crisp and thin crust.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Deep-fried milk balls soaked in sugar syrup, served warm with a hint of cardamom.

name: Rasgulla
description: Soft and spongy cottage cheese balls soaked in sugar syrup, a classic Indian sweet.

name: Momo
description: Steamed dumplings filled with vegetables or meat, served with spicy tomato chutney.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Juicy chicken chunks cooked in a flavorful and fragrant curry sauce, accompanied by fluffy basmati rice.

name: Jalebi
description: Crispy and syrupy sweet made by deep-frying flour batter in pretzel or circular shapes, soaked in sugar syrup.
